name: Panora
headline: AI Copilot for Warehouse Coordinators
description: Panora helps warehouses drive more business by connecting to any e-commerce platform and provides an AI assistant that automates data entry into WMS & ERPs platforms.
tags: industry:warehouse-management-tech; industry:logistics; industry:api; industry:infrastructure; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Rachid Flih, Founder
founders.description: Helping warehouses scale up their business without adding more operations

![YCombinator](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/ycombinator-ar21.svg)
# Grow your warehouse business with our AI Assistant
Panora helps warehouses drive more business by connecting to any e-commerce platform – and provides an AI assistant that automates data entry into WMS & ERPs platforms.
[ Let's Talk ](https://getpanora.com/<https:/cal.com/rflih/s30>)
[ Free Advisory Call ](https://getpanora.com/<https:/cal.com/rflih/15>)
  * First Month Free
  * Skip Data Entry
  * Get back 6 hours / week
  * Cancel anytime


![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Hero-Image-1.webp)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Hero-Image-3.webp)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cropped-Icon-512.png)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Hero-Image-2.webp)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Hero-Image-4.webp)
## Expand across e-commerce platforms. Automate your warehouse operations. Add revenue, not complexity
Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to a streamlined operations. Whatever your warehouse size is, AI do the heavy lifting. 
####  Connect to any E-Commerce 
Use one API to retrieve data from Shopify, Amazon, and more. Panora is your source of truth for incoming orders.
####  Effortless inventory updates 
Let AI extracts inbound deliveries from your inboxes to update your WMS & ERPs autonomously, or under employee authority
####  24/7 Quoting & Support 
Our virtual employees are aware of your inventory and answer questions anytime, by text or voice, on many channels
## Eliminate manual data entry
From your inbox to inventory in seconds. Panora detects incoming deliveries in your inbox and loads them into your WMS and ERPs. 
  * Avoid data entry errors
  * Make your own metrics using external data
  * Save 6 hours per week


[ Learn More ](https://getpanora.com/<https:/cal.com/rflih/30>)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Advantage-Image-1.webp)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Advantage-Image-2.webp)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Insights-Image-1.webp)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Marketing-Automation-Insights-Image-2.webp)
## Accurate quotes in seconds
Panora offers a flexible billing engine. Answer questions and deliver quotes based on storage, pick&pack, packaging and more parameters. 
  * Adapts to the most complex pricing strategies
  * Accurate quotes in seconds
  * Cut time spent on quotes by 80%


[ Schedule a Demo ](https://getpanora.com/<https:/cal.com/rflih/30>)
## Integrate with any ecommerce platform
Quote over email in a second and offload calls to our vocal assistants. Win more deals while cutting your time spent on quotes by 80%. 
  * Receive orders from Amazon, Shopify and more in a single format​
  * Get running in a day, not weeks
  * Offload sensitive customer data to our team


[ Let's Talk ](https://getpanora.com/<https:/cal.com/rflih/30>)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Online-Software-Integrations-Image-1.webp)
![](https://getpanora.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cropped-Icon-512.png)
## Start automating your warehouse now
[ Let's Talk ](https://getpanora.com/<https:/cal.com/rflih/30>)

generated_description:
**Panora: Revolutionizing Warehouse Management with AI**

Founded in 2024 and hailing from the dynamic tech hub of San Francisco, Panora is on a mission to simplify warehouse operations with its innovative AI Copilot designed specifically for warehouse coordinators. As part of the esteemed Y Combinator Batch S24, Panora is tackling a critical pain point in the e-commerce landscape.

The essence of Panora's offering lies in its cutting-edge AI assistant that seamlessly integrates with any e-commerce platform. This integration automates the often tedious task of data entry into Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) platforms. By serving as a bridge between multiple e-commerce sites like Amazon and Shopify and internal logistics, Panora helps warehouses not just keep pace, but thrive in an increasingly competitive market.

With only a small team of two and mentorship from Michael Seibel, a well-regarded Group Partner at Y Combinator, Panora is nimble enough to iterate quickly and adapt to customer feedback.

**What Makes Panora Stand Out?**
- **Streamlined Operations:** The AI assistant curtails manual data entry, slashing errors and saving an estimated six hours a week per user.
- **Flexible Integrations:** Panora supports various integrations including CRM tools like HubSpot and Pipedrive, numerous e-commerce platforms, and essential cloud file storage services like Google Drive and Dropbox.
- **24/7 Support & Quoting:** Their virtual assistants provide constant availability, offering inventory knowledge and quick quoting, enhancing customer service and operational efficiency.

**Benefits for Users:**
- **Elimination of Manual Data Entry:** Incoming deliveries are detected from your inbox and loaded into systems automatically.
- **Real-Time Inventory Management:** Maintain up-to-date records effortlessly, adapting to fluctuating stock levels without manual input.
- **Enhanced Productivity:** By letting AI handle routine tasks, warehouse coordinators can focus on growth strategies rather than day-to-day operations.

Funding from Y Combinator signifies a robust backing for this ambitious startup, which is well-positioned to disrupt the warehouse management landscape. In a world where efficiency is king, Panora offers the tools to not just keep up, but to excel.

For more information, check out their website at [getpanora.com](https://getpanora.com/) and explore how they can help transform your warehouse operations.
